summary: Samy Goldstein, a writer for a television program, is surrounded by an oppressive female environment. Then decides to resume his passion for literature. Meet Mary, a beauty in crisis. From there a series of misunderstandings will happen.
cast: Ricardo Darín|Angie Cepeda|Cristina Banegas|Alejandra Flechner|Henny Trayles|Alejandra Darín|Carolina Pelleritti|Rita Cortese|Roberto Pettinato|Norberto Arcusín|Fernando Brun|Juan Capizzano|Nicolás Carreño|Osvaldo Drat|Pochi Ducasse|Gabriel Eisbruch|Alejandra Fernández|Rolando Graña|Miguel Guerberof|Hernán Jiménez|Gabriel Kraisman|Cecilia Labourt|Graciela Lauro|Héctor Malamud|Eduardo Milewicz|Néstor Montalbano|Agostina Mottola|Lucrecia Pinto|Juan Carlos Ricci|Fabián Talín|Juan Manuel Viscay
title: Un tipo corriente
